## TranslationJobInfo.sourceRevision property

The minor version of the source Item for this translation; null if the source Item is not versioned or the source version has been lost due to it being promoted or demoted in the BluePrint.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get sourceRevision(): number | undefined;
```
